segments.text: Ugh, that sink is gushing water like a fountain gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in the filthy puddle, soaking her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wiping that plate, but everything's getting ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids climbing for cookies in this mess, hands probably dirty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs splayed out, grimy floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinets, staining the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, exposed to the damp chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking treats while the kitchen floods, so irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a clean garden, mocking the sloppiness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dish towel bunched up, probably damp now too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just gross and avoidable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the needless waste and grime.
segments.speaker: PAR
